text:
Homegate | Zurich, Switzerland | Onsite | Fulltime

We're migrating away from OnPremise into AWS, using microservices, using AWS lambda and Typescript. Just got a new CEO, and a lot of new high profile hires, lots of fresh energy on board.

Many fullstack/frontend positions are open:

- Fullstack: https://homegate.teamtailor.com/jobs/68859

- Senior Fullstack: https://homegate.teamtailor.com/jobs/110014

- Frontend: https://homegate.teamtailor.com/jobs/128544

To apply just write to me: philipp.keller@homegate.ch. First 1-2 interview rounds are remote.
